channel.title: [pi]Reset Levels
channel.description: In the quest tab I am trying to add a button that says "Reset Levels" I have it all done and an dialogue that shows up saying "Would you like to reset your ALL your levels?" etc. Now how to I make it reset all the levels the player has?

item.title: [pi]Reset Levels
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

I found this command you could probably make this work.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("reset")) { if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You are not aloud to reset stats while in Wild!"); return; } for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command."); return; } } String skillName = playerCommand.substring(6); Object[][] SKILL_INFO = { {"Attack", 0}, {"Defence", 1}, {"Strength", 2}, {"Hitpoints", 3}, {"Range", 4}, {"Prayer", 5}, {"Mage", 6} }; for (int i = 0; i < SKILL_INFO.length; i++) { Object[] data = SKILL_INFO[i]; if (skillName.equalsIgnoreCase((String) data[0])) { c.playerXP[(Integer) data[1]] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(1) + 5; c.playerLevel[(Integer) data[1]] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[(Integer) data[1]]); c.getPA().refreshSkill((Integer) data[1]); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]Reset Levels
item.dc:creator: @BeastChris BeastChris
item.description:
@BeastChris wrote:

Go.to this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,491404.msg3593505.html#msg3593505 change the code to work to your sever and to reset all skills insted of one

I have it all done and an dialogue that shows up saying “Would you like to reset your ALL your levels?” etc.
Now how to I make it reset all the levels the player has?
